column4: kufar: The most interesting I see is [ 1499.960040] usb 1-4: ath9k_htc: Firmware - ar9271.fw download failed
kufar: Do you already have internet working on this box?
Then it shouldn't fail to download the firmware..
Where do you see these messages anyway?
Make sure the connection is working when it tries to auto-download the fw
Or, boot the computer with the device un plugged, then plug it in once you know you have a reliable connection
